name: Ticky's Wake Up Call
description:
In Ticky's Wake Up Call, you play as Ticky, the walking, talking alarm clock! Ticky has a very important job to do, and it's up to you to make sure he does it on time! Dodge traps and solve dangerous situations all while trying to beat the game as fast as possible!

Controls:
Up - Arrow Up, W
Down - Arrow Down, S
Left - Arrow Left, A
Right - Arrow Right, D
A - Alt, Z, J
B - Ctrl, X, K
Select - Shift
This game does have controller support, but inputs may vary.

This game was originally started for the Game Boy Showdown game jam, but was too big to finish in time. A week after the submission deadline, here is a little game ironically about not missing your deadline!

With Love ~                
~ PizzaBoy
